text:
As of 2024-12-31, UBSG reported:
- Total assets: 1.57 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 223.33 billion USD
- Total debt: 322.13 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 85.08 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 78.19 billion USD
- Net debt: 98.80 billion USD

As of 2023-12-31, UBSG reported:
- Total assets: 1.72 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 317.21 billion USD
- Total debt: 377.69 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 86.11 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 78.59 billion USD
- Net debt: 54.97 billion USD

As of 2022-12-31, UBSG reported:
- Total assets: 1.10 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 172.82 billion USD
- Total debt: 193.28 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 56.88 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 50.61 billion USD
- Net debt: 17.12 billion USD

As of 2021-12-31, UBSG reported:
- Total assets: 1.12 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 194.80 billion USD
- Total debt: 218.74 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 60.66 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 54.28 billion USD
- Net debt: 20.39 billion USD

As of 2020-12-31, UBSG reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
- Tangible book value: not available
- Net debt: not available
